entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a location where the events are taking place. It is described as having a filthy window and a stove.

entities.name: morfin
entities.description: Morfin is a person who lets out a mad cackle of laughter when the pot shoots across the floor.

entities.name: gaunt
entities.description: Gaunt is a person who screams at Morfin to mend the pot and later jeers at his daughter Merope.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is a Squib who stumbles across the room and tries to mend the pot with her wand before Ogden intervenes.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is a person from the Ministry who uses the spell 'Reparo' to mend the pot instantly.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is an organization that Ogden is affiliated with.

entities.name: pot
entities.description: The pot is an object that shoots across the floor and cracks in two when it hits the wall.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Merope's wand is an object used for magic spells.

relationships.description: Ogden uses the spell 'Reparo' to mend the pot instantly.
Gaunt jeers at his daughter Merope, calling her a dirty Squib.
